com.comphenix.xp.rewards

Interface RewardService

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Service
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    RewardDrops, RewardEconomy, RewardExperience, RewardVirtual

    public interface RewardService
extends Service
    Represents a method of rewarding a player with resources.
    Author:
    Kristian

    • Method Summary

    • Method Detail

      • canReward

        boolean canReward(org.bukkit.entity.Player player,
                ResourceHolder resource)
        Whether or not the player actually can be rewarded (or penalized, if negative) with the given amount of resources.
        Parameters:
        player - - player to test.
        resource - - the resource to give or take away.

      • reward

        void reward(org.bukkit.entity.Player player,
          ResourceHolder resource)
        Rewards a player directly.
        Parameters:
        player - - player to award.
        resource - - the resource to give or take away.

      • reward

        void reward(org.bukkit.entity.Player player,
          org.bukkit.Location point,
          ResourceHolder resource)
        Rewards a player with the given amount of resources.
        Parameters:
        player - - player to award.
        point - - if possible, the location the award will be placed.
        resource - - the resource to give or take away.

      • reward

        void reward(org.bukkit.World world,
          org.bukkit.Location point,
          ResourceHolder resource)
        Creates a reward at a given location through any means necessary.
        Parameters:
        world - - the world to create this reward.
        point - - where to put this reward.
        resource - - the resource to give or take away.

      • getRewardType

        Retrieves the reward type.

      • clone

        RewardService clone(Configuration config)
        Clones this object with the settings from the given configuration.
        Parameters:
        config - - configuration file.
        Returns:
        A new reward manager with the given settings.
